reviews.customers_say: Customers find this denim dress comfortable and flattering, with a form-fitting bodice and waist. The dress is well-made with good material quality that isn't thin or cheap, and has some stretch. However, several customers report an awful smell. Select to learn more Fit Style Quality Stretchiness Material quality Comfort Flattering Smell 49 customers mention "Fit" 36 positive 13 negative Customers love the fit of the dress, noting it's not too loose, with one customer specifically mentioning its form-fitting bodice and waist silhouette. "Great dress, awesome fit . But, I who can hardly smell anything, am overwhelmed with the chemical smell on this dress. I’ve washed it twice...." Read more "Dress is cute and fits well but the black denim has such a strong chemical smell that doesn’t go away. Washed the dress twice and it still stinks...." Read more "I LOVED this dress, but it is too large in the shoulders and too tight in the hips!..." Read more "...I think I’d be constantly messing with them to keep them down. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite thing I've ordered in a while
items.body: Wicked cute, wicked comfortable, very flattering stretchy jean dress. I am 5 ft tall and 125 lb and I got the small. It fits perfectly, it's snug and that's the way I wanted it, nice and fitted. The material has a little give so it's easy to slide on and off even if you keep it buttoned. I love it! Read more
items.author: Autumn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Comfy, and versatile
items.body: Absolutely love this denim dress! The fit is flattering without feeling tight, and the material has the perfect amount of softness and structure. Easy to dress up with boots or keep casual with sneakers. It’s one of those pieces you can throw on and instantly feel put together. Definitely a new favorite in my closet! Read more
items.author: Andrew Wallett

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and perfect for Fall and Winter
items.body: This is a great fitting dress and hugs your curves. I has suffcient stretch for areas that might be a little smaller than the dress. It is a rich deep color. The length is good. Short enough to look sexy but not too short. The only reason for 4 stars is that the fabric is much thicker then I like. It wouldn't stop me from buying another color though. Read more
items.author: Mary Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars super cute and fun!
items.body: Very cute dress!!!! ordered a Large. Didn't have any smell like I saw in the reviews. Fits great and gives a perfect amount of stretch. Wearing it for a bachelorette party with some boots! Very cute!!!! Read more
items.author: Cynthia Guerra

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t light a match while wearing dress!
items.body: This dress smells horrendous. I washed it 3 times and it still smelt toxic. It smells like it’s been soaked in gasoline. Probably shouldn’t light a match near it. If you buy the dress, for the love of God, don’t smoke a cigarette while wearing it! Besides the toxic smell, it fit so well and was adorable. Would have kept it if I could have washed the stench out of it! Read more
items.author: c c

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and durable
items.body: Love this dress! Very cute Read more
items.author: Monica

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I ordered as recommended but it’s too big. Material is soft and stretchy and lightweight. I will be returning it Read more
items.author: Sol Nuno

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was a keeper!
items.body: Super cute! Wore it with cowboy boots to a country concert! Fabric felt quality and it fit well. Read more
items.author: Taryn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Blue, Dark Pink, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Light Blue, White, Deep Blue, Beige, Dark Blue, Denim Blue, Retro Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
